abstract: Federal Judge Jed S Rakoff rules that aggressive tactics used by ride-hailing company Uber to investigate background of plaintiff who has filed class-action lawsuit against company crossed ethical line; suit accuses Uber and chief executive Travis Kalanick of price-fixing.
lead_paragraph: A Yale environmentalist filed a lawsuit against Uber accusing it of price-fixing. In response, Uber hired a Ergo, an outside agency, to look into his background.

headline.main: Thinking About Suing Uber? Let This Be a Warning.
headline.print_headline: Investigation of Conservationist Conducted for Uber Crossed Line, Judge Rules

snippet: A Yale environmentalist filed a lawsuit against Uber accusing it of price-fixing. In response, Uber hired a Ergo, an outside agency, to look into his background....
